properties.name: mt.link-spray.protocol
properties.description: The protocol to use for the link spray service, eg: https, https.

properties.name: mt.link-spray.host
properties.description: The host of the link spray service, eg: link-spray.example.com, localhost.

properties.name: mt.link-spray.port
properties.description: The port of the link spray service, eg: 443, 8080.

properties.name: mt.link-spray.random-id.charset
properties.description: The charset to use for generating random ids, eg: abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789.

properties.name: mt.link-spray.random-id.length
properties.description: The length of the random id to generate, prefix lentgh prefix included, eg: 8.

properties.name: mt.link-spray.random-id.prefix
properties.description: The prefixto use for the random id, eg: id-, cde-. Can be empty.

properties.name: mt.link-spray.random-id.cache.enabled
properties.description: Enable the cache for the random id generation, eg: true, false.

properties.name: mt.link-spray.random-id.cache.depth
properties.description: The depth of the cache for the random id generation, the number of ids generated, eg: 1000.

properties.name: mt.link-spray.random-id.cache.treshold
properties.description: The treshold of the cache for the random id generation, below this value it will trigger a cache refresh, eg: 100.

properties.name: build.timestamp
properties.description: The timestamp of the maven build.

properties.name: mt.link-spray.version
properties.description: The version of the link spray service.

properties.name: build.artifactId
properties.description: The artifactId of the maven build.

properties.name: build.version
properties.description: The version of the maven build.

properties.name: mt.link-spray.notification.mail.sender
properties.description: The sender email address of the notification mail, eg: my.link.spray@address.com.

properties.name: mt.link-spray.notification.mail.receiver
properties.description: The receiver email address of the notification mail, eg:my.link.spray@address.com.
